item.title: Virtual Environment in Ubuntu
item.description: Setting up Virtual environment in ubuntu (Probably the best way) Setting up virtual environment using virtual-environment-wrapper Ubuntu Linux 18.04 Comes with Python 3.6.6 by default. you can verify the same from terminal python3 -V Python 3.6.6 The package helper pip3 tool will not comes by default . You can install pip3 in the bash terminal using: sudo apt install python3-pip Install the tool using pip3: pip3 install virtualenvwrapper Then find the location of the python executables
